snippet: A son of late Penn State football coach Joe Paterno has sued the university over his dismissal from its coaching staff two years ago, saying he has been unfairly linked to the Jerry Sandusky child molestation scandal....

headline.print_headline: Paterno Son, Other Former Assistant Sue Penn State
headline.main: Paterno Son, Other Former Assistant Sue Penn State

lead_paragraph: A son of late Penn State football coach Joe Paterno has sued the university over his dismissal from its coaching staff two years ago, saying he has been unfairly linked to the Jerry Sandusky child molestation scandal.
